hero.description: IT HOUSE is a place to make everything possible, new IT career, new future

contact.address: Tashkent, Uchtepa district, OAZIS shopping center, 2nd floor

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.subtitle: Choose your future profession!
courses.description: Learn the field based on real projects and become a sought-after specialist!

items.question: I have no knowledge in IT, can I start from zero?
items.answer: Of course! Our courses start from scratch. No prior knowledge is required.

items.question: How long are the courses?
items.answer: Duration depends on the course — from 2 to 12 months. For example: Foundation course — 2 months, Full Stack — 12 months.

items.question: Is installment payment available?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! Payment in installments month by month is available during the course.

items.question: Do you help with job placement?
items.answer: Yes, we provide full assistance with CV preparation, interview training, and job placement.

items.question: Online or offline?
items.answer: Both formats are available. You can choose the one convenient for you.

items.question: Is a certificate provided?
items.answer: Yes, an official state-recognized certificate is provided.

forWho.description: Age and experience do not matter — we teach everything from scratch

graduates.cta_sub: Become a professional IT specialist and work in top global companies!
